title: PU marks
content:
For the past week and a half i had been trying to submit my board marks but was unable to do so as the site crashed every time I tried to. I submitted my marks today but June 7 was supposed to be the deadline and I've missed it by one day. 
Pes helpline doesn't pick up calls. Am I still eligible for admission or out of luck?

comments.body: Try to contact them with different no.s or try to write a mail to them addressing the situation....
If you live near Bangalore then you should visit the campus.
